practice_phrases: It might have happened on the first day.
这可能发生在第一天。
It might have happened when I moved my head.
这可能发生当我移动头部时。
It might have happened in the office.
这可能发生在办公室。
It might have happened when they both came.
这可能发生当他们两个都来的时候。
It might have happened when they left together.
这可能发生当他们一起离开了。
It might have happened when I went to fetch the keys.
这可能发生当我去拿钥匙的时候。
It might have happened on the first day of the new year.
这可能发生在新年的第一天。
It might have happened when she went to look for somewhere safe.
这可能发生当她去找一个安全的地方的时候。
It might have happened when I couldn't imagine the same problem.
这可能发生当我无法想象相同的问题的时候。
It might have happened when the news took several hours to reach everyone.
这可能发生当这个消息花了几个小时才传到每个人的时候。

seed_context.known: It might have happened to the whole family.
seed_context.target: 这可能发生在整个家庭身上。

practice_phrases: The whole family came.
整个家庭来了。
I saw the whole family.
我见过整个家庭。
The whole family left together.
整个家庭一起离开了。
The whole family went on the first day.
整个家庭第一天就去了。
The whole family found the perfect house.
整个家庭找到了完美的房子。
It might have happened to the whole family.
这可能发生在整个家庭身上。
The whole family came on their own on the first day.
整个家庭第一天就自己来了。
I haven't seen the whole family yet when they left.
他们离开的时候我还没见过整个家庭。
The whole family went to look for somewhere safe to park.
整个家庭去找一个安全的地方停车了。
It might have happened to the whole family when the news reached everyone.
这个消息传到每个人的时候这可能发生在整个家庭身上。

seed_context.known: It might have happened to the whole family.

她去找一个安全的地方的时候这可能发生在整个家庭身上。

practice_phrases: It happened to me.
这发生在我身上。
The same thing happened to everyone.
相同的事情发生在每个人身上。
It might happen to you.
这可能发生在你身上。
The problem happened to the whole family.
这个问题发生在整个家庭身上。
It might have happened to them on the first day.
这可能发生在他们身上第一天。
The same problem happened to me when I moved my head.
相同的问题发生在我身上当我移动头部时。
It might have happened to the whole family when they came.
这可能发生在整个家庭身上当他们来了。
Exactly the same thing happened to everyone in the office.
完全相同的事情发生在办公室的每个人身上。
It might have happened to them when the news took several hours to reach everyone.
这可能发生在他们身上当这个消息花了几个小时才传到每个人。
I couldn't imagine the same problem happening to the whole family on the first day.
我无法想象相同的问题发生在整个家庭身上第一天。

seed_context.known: It might have happened to the whole family.
seed_context.target: 这可能发生在整个家庭身上。

practice_phrases: My family.
我的家庭。
Their family came.

我第一天就找到了我的家庭。
The whole family left together.

My family went to look for the perfect house.

I haven't seen their family yet when they left.

The news took several hours to reach my whole family in the office.
这个消息花了几个小时才传到办公室的我整个家庭。
I couldn't imagine exactly the same problem happening to my family when they went to look for somewhere safe.
我无法想象完全相同的问题发生在我的家庭身上当他们去找一个安全的地方。
It might have happened to the whole family.
这可能发生在整个家庭身上。
